```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}

# Scenario 1

m = 31752   # kg

A = 16      # m2

V = c(30, 8/3.6, 120/3.6, 40/3.6, 5/3.6) # Convert Velocities to m/s, 1 m/s = 3.6km/hr

Power1 = veh_eff (V, A, m)

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Scenario 2

m = 15000   # kg

Power2 = veh_eff (V, A, m)

```


```{r, echo=FALSE}

#combine Data into single dataframe 

veh_power_gen = cbind.data.frame(V, Power1, Power2)

```

```{r, echo=FALSE}

#plot

ggplot(data = veh_power_gen, aes(V, Power1)) + 
        geom_line(col="blue") +
        geom_line(aes(V, Power2), col="red") +
         labs(x="Velocity (m/s)", y="Power Comsumption (Watts)")
  
  

```
